sense.def:
Kadar nečesa ni dovolj ali tistega sploh ni, to imenujemo
a lack of something
.

seg.quote: I hated the lack of privacy in the dormitory.
Lack of proper funding is making our job more difficult.

sense.def:
To lack something
pomeni nečesa ne imeti.

seg.quote: They lack the confidence to make friends.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is lacking
, tistega ni dovolj ali sploh ni.

seg.quote: ‘What is lacking in this case,’ he concluded, ‘is a corpse.’

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
is lacking in a particular quality
, določene lastnosti nima ali je nima dovolj.

seg.quote: Philip was not lacking in intelligence or ability.

sense.def:
No lack of something
pomeni, da je nečesa veliko in morda več, kot je treba.

seg.quote: There was no lack of schools to choose from.
